quotes.quoteStatement: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quoteStatement: You can observe a lot just by watching.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quoteStatement: A house divided against itself cannot stand.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quoteStatement: Difficulties increase the nearer we get to the goal.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quoteStatement: Fate is in your hands and no one elses
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quoteStatement: Be the chief but never the lord.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quoteStatement: Nothing happens unless first we dream.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quoteStatement: Life is a learning experience, only if you learn.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quoteStatement: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quoteStatement: What you give is what you get.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quoteStatement: We can only learn to love by loving.
quotes.author: Iris Murdoch

quotes.quoteStatement: Life is change. Growth is optional. Choose wisely.
quotes.author: Karen Clark

quotes.quoteStatement: You'll see it when you believe it.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer
